EmailTemplate.name: 2019_Primus_Elite_Keselowski_Campaign.2019_02_Daytona_500_Demo_Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Invitation: Learn why NASCAR Champion Brad Keselowski chose Primus Elite
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Learn why NASCAR Champion Brad Keselowski flies with Primus Elite You're invited to stop in for demonstrations of Primus Elite on Brad's Lear 45 during Daytona Speedweeks DATES Daytona Speedweeks February 14-17, 2019
TIMES 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM Daily
LOCATION SheltAir Aviation Services 563 Pearl Harbor Dr, Daytona Beach, FL 32114
PERSONAL DEMONSTRATIONS WITH JOEY MEIER Friday, February 15 9:00 AM - Noon Lunch served Other times available by appointment, voice/text Dennis Paine, 941-320-6232.
I'm Joey Meier, one of Brad's pilots. I'll be on hand during Daytona Speedweek to introduce you to the Primus Elite upgrade on Brad's Lear 45. I'm passionate about the cockpit upgrade and can't wait to show you why.
The demonstrations will cover all Primus Elite certified aircraft: Global Express, Falcon 900EX/C, Legacy 600, Lear 40/45, Citation X (550/560 in near future), Dornier 328, and Gulfstream GIV/GIV-SP/GV. I can also fill you in on Honeywell’s ADS-B solution, HAPP, MSP and GoDirect Flight Services.
If you can't attend a demonstration, download the infographic <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Primus Elite Value Infographic.pdf]]> that explains the benefits of upgrading to Primus Elite.
